batchCall(bytes[]).details: Call multiple public functions on this contract in a single transaction.

params.callDatas: ABI-encoded call data for each function call.

returns.callResults: ABI-encoded results data for each call.

params.curveInfo: Curve information specific to this token pair.
params.fromTokenIdx: Index of the taker token (what to sell).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.toTokenIdx: Index of the maker token (what to buy).

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

sampleBuysFromMStable(address,address,ad.details: Sample buy quotes from MStable contract

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token sell amount for each sample.
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.path: Token route. Should be takerToken -> makerToken.
params.router: Router to look up tokens and amounts

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token buy amount for each sample.
params.path: Token route. Should be takerToken -> makerToken (at most two hops).

returns.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts sold at each maker token amount.
returns.uniswapPaths: The encoded uniswap path for each sample.
